entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.0.3
entry.content: Under construction, full changelog will be updated after build completion... feat: support TODO note type #698

entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.0.4
entry.content: feat: add react-simple-pull-to-refresh dependency and update icon in BlinkoRightClickMenu fix: update ExpandableContainer and ScrollArea components for improved functionality and styling feat: add pull-to-refresh functionality in ScrollArea component and update translations for multiple languages chore: update app-release.yml to set releaseDraft and draft to false, and modify changelog templates feat: add edit message functionality and share conversation feature, update translations for multiple languages

entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed models url by @robjvan in https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/pull/701

New Contributors

  • @robjvan made their first contribution in https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/pull/701

Full Changelog: https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/compare/1.0.4...1.0.5

entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.0.6
entry.content:
• No notable changes in this release

What's Changed

  • Bind to all network interfaces (was: only localhost) by @wsw70 in https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/pull/708
  • feat: add deadline management features to TODO items, including expiration handling and quick selection options for setting deadlines
  • fix: update PluginInfo schema to make author, url, minAppVersion, displayName, description, readme, downloads optional; improve PluginCard styling and clean up whitespace in plugin router
  • feat: enhance OAuth callback handling by adding return button on error, update public routes, and improve user navigation flow

New Contributors

  • @wsw70 made their first contribution in https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/pull/708

Full Changelog: https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/compare/1.0.5...1.0.6

entry.title: New release for Blinko: Blinko 1.0.7
entry.content:
‚ú® New Features

  • add AI configuration import feature with multilingual support in translation files https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/552e8812296a48c7dd601d16695e904f19b12605

‚ú® New Features

  • add Tauri process and updater plugins to enhance application functionality https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/8c7ff53b112ebaabcb16c83cc114aee9a1c2ea45
  • add showOverlay prop to UserAvatarDropdown for hover effect in Sidebar https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/5e385d88a13f4c2e39315b24c5b4f8e3db587355
  • enhance settings page layout with responsive design for mobile and desktop views https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/6173bb9c7ea673450353e7bfa225b849f3cdb031
  • conditionally add Tauri updater plugin for non-mobile platforms https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/ad8a67ad67b8969d3807b145df5a32ee18844bec
  • Update changelog configuration to improve commit type handling and rendering https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/6ebc5b7887339c40458b5d5225129a5336af7891

üêõ Bugfixes

  • correct syntax for server start callback in index.ts https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/4a1dc748e52286f8dd9d14982849f90697648c2a
  • update sign-in redirect to use dynamic Blinko endpoint https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/3371829ae47bdbdf2318a18669e59a6832499af6

üîß Chores

  • Update version to 1.0.5 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/2e4fed56779e9a3ec4ea7c1770f4039f4e7c8542
  • Update version to 1.0.7 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/2374b6eae9487e70319aee2b2d36aebe950e8bb1
  • Fix changelog configuration format https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/5715d8299023ad95d99dc969cc54c021b2cc744f

üîç Other Changes

  • [ci skip] Update version to 1.0.6 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/7f66e71cf91a595ab461f3cdca019cf377e4e6e8
  • [ci skip] Update version to 1.0.5 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/8be01a601481d5189f975ae1e6b84f67f52f635a
  • [ci skip] Update version to 1.0.6 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/a21b5b63f22e75a473e8c93d9b59542ee36d61ef
  • Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/f13ce87306d131122080539747137b918598de8a
  • Merge pull request #712 by blinko-space from blinkospace/bug-fix https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/4e5e31c830ba3e50f8f07f33c221ad6244ce8f81
  • [ci skip] Update version to 1.0.7 https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/84540970e8d3dfade90997ee3fa18eebc8a1687d
  • Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/a3dd691ed82298c59511ae4192fb5f693ebc0bf7

‚ú®chore

  • update changelog generation process to use new action and fetch all tags https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/f45e8329a65346d385972c334c69cfa38e2d8670
  • install global prisma packae to enhance dependency management https://github.com/blinkospace/blinko/commit/684af739b14fd30fe94e3c9b84d6b819d5dd798f
